channel.title: How do I make an npc talk
channel.description:
Ok well, my friend and I are curently working on full lumbridge... But I need to know like how do I make an npc talk. For ex: Those mans in lumbridge, I right click on them and click " Talk-to man " and it doesn't do anyhting. :confused: So yea, how can I make them say something.
A fast reply asap would be appreciated.
~ Macoronizer
